itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Billy Moore (17 February 1910 – 31 March 1976) was a Welsh international dual-code rugby player who played rugby union for Bridgend RFC and rugby league for Rochdale Hornets. He was capped only once for Wales under the union code, for a match in the 1933 Home Nations Championship.

response: *Billy Moore (boxer), English retired Muay Thai boxer
*Billy Moore (rugby league) (born 1971), Australian rugby league footballer
